text: Yabonani! uAllâh Wathabatha uMnqophiso nabaProfeti, othi: “Thabathani nantoni na eNdininika yona, evela esiBhalweni nasebulumkweni4, emva koko kuza kufika kuni uMthunywa oya kungqinela oko kukuni, kufuneka nikholwe ke nina kuye nimncedise”. Wathi uAllâh: “Niyavuma na. Niya kuwuthabatha na uMnqophiso waM?” Bathi bona: “Siyavuma”. Wathi Yena: “Ngqinani ke yaye Mna Ndiya kuba nani phakathi kwamangqina
